title: NoSuchElementException at startup
body:
### Description
`DefaultPerformanceTracker` threw a `NoSuchElementException` at startup.

Looks like it started running before the beacon chain data had loaded.  It shouldn't attempt to run before the chain head is known.

```
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:24.721 INFO  - Epoch Event *** Epoch: 39556, Justified checkpoint: 39554, Finalized checkpoint: 39553, Finalized root: 162f5b..0352
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:24.726 ERROR - PLEASE FIX OR REPORT | Unexpected exception thrown for event 'interface tech.pegasys.teku.ethereum.events.SlotEventsChannel.onSlot' in handler 'tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.performance.DefaultPerformanceTracker'
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku java.util.NoSuchElementException: No value present
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at java.util.Optional.orElseThrow(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.performance.DefaultPerformanceTracker.getBlockPerformanceForEpochs(DefaultPerformanceTracker.java:195) ~[teku-validator-coordinator-21.9.1.jar:21.9.1]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at tech.pegasys.teku.validator.coordinator.performance.DefaultPerformanceTracker.onSlot(DefaultPerformanceTracker.java:145) ~[teku-validator-coordinator-21.9.1.jar:21.9.1]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at jdk.internal.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor5.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at jdk.internal.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source) ~[?:?]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.DirectEventDeliverer.executeMethod(DirectEventDeliverer.java:74) ~[teku-infrastructure-events-21.9.1.jar:21.9.1]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.DirectEventDeliverer.deliverTo(DirectEventDeliverer.java:54) ~[teku-infrastructure-events-21.9.1.jar:21.9.1]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.AsyncEventDeliverer.lambda$deliverTo$0(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:61) ~[teku-infrastructure-events-21.9.1.jar:21.9.1]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.AsyncEventDeliverer$QueueReader.deliverNextEvent(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:117) [teku-infrastructure-events-21.9.1.jar:21.9.1]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.events.AsyncEventDeliverer$QueueReader.run(AsyncEventDeliverer.java:109) [teku-infrastructure-events-21.9.1.jar:21.9.1]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:?]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:?]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:?]
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:26.941 INFO  - Successfully loaded deposits up to Eth1 block 5499804
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:29.380 INFO  - Completed regeneration of block 0xf495c128b87a3b3b506290c482fb3829c900ad3f923125057097ef0b84fef755 at slot 1265784 by replaying 50 blocks. Took 6051ms
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:29.384 INFO  - Starting libp2p network...
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:29.385 INFO  - Not performing attestation duties for slot 1265792 because it is too far ahead of the current slot UNDEFINED
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:29.391 INFO  - Listening for connections on: /ip4/52.142.27.69/tcp/31500/p2p/16Uiu2HAmBHJLf6W9RMSzv9npqvTuPJA7MKLsQme8srzvQg41oDgt
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:29.397 INFO  - Starting discovery server on UDP port 31500
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:29.408 INFO  - UDP discovery client started
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:29.411 INFO  - Skipping head block update to avoid potential rollback of the chain head.
teku-beacon-port-test-1 teku 09:18:29.412 INFO  - Skipping head block update to avoid potential rollback of the chain head.
```
